languages.text: "Кристалл изыскан в прозрачной воде. Отклонение от траектории Цикла увеличено, как желал Амарнат". {n}Авель опускает голову, и его вокс-синтезатор транслирует бинарный гимн, который вам прежде не доводилось слышать. Его звуки наполнены энергичной вибрацией, а строгая ритмичность даже приятна уху — редкость для языка {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Механикус{/g}.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Кристалл изыскан в прозрачной воде. Отклонение от траектории Цикла увеличено, как желал Амарнат". {n}Авель опускает голову, и его вокс-синтезатор транслирует бинарный гимн, который вам прежде не доводилось слышать. Его звуки наполнены энергичной вибрацией, а строгая ритмичность даже приятна уху — редкость для языка {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Механикус{/g}.{/n}

languages.text: "A crystal is exquisite in clear water. Deviation from the Cycle's trajectory has been increased, as was Amarnat's wish." {n}Abel lowers his head, and his vox-synthesiser broadcasts a binharic hymn you do not recall having heard before. Its sound is full of vibrant energy and its precise rhythm is nothing short of pleasing to the ear: a rare thing for the language of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Кристалл изыскан в прозрачной воде. Отклонение от траектории Цикла увеличено, как желал Амарнат". {n}Авель опускает голову, и его вокс-синтезатор транслирует бинарный гимн, который вам прежде не доводилось слышать. Его звуки наполнены энергичной вибрацией, а строгая ритмичность даже приятна уху — редкость для языка {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Механикус{/g}.{/n}

languages.text: 「澄んだ水の中の水晶は非常に美しい。アマルナトの願い通り、サイクルの弾道からの逸脱が増えています」{n}アベルは頭を下げた。彼のヴォクス・シンセは、あなたがこれまでに聴いたことのないビンハリックの讃歌を流している。その音は活気に満ちており、正確なリズムは耳心地の良いものだった。{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}帝国技術局{/g}の言語にしては珍しいことである。{/n}
languages.original_text: "A crystal is exquisite in clear water. Deviation from the Cycle's trajectory has been increased, as was Amarnat's wish." {n}Abel lowers his head, and his vox-synthesiser broadcasts a binharic hymn you do not recall having heard before. Its sound is full of vibrant energy and its precise rhythm is nothing short of pleasing to the ear: a rare thing for the language of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「澄んだ水の中の水晶は非常に美しい。アマルナトの願い通り、サイクルの弾道からの逸脱が増えています」{n}アベルは頭を下げた。彼のヴォクス・シンセは、あなたがこれまでに聴いたことのないビンハリックの讃歌を流している。その音は活気に満ちており、正確なリズムは耳心地の良いものだった。{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}帝国技術局{/g}の言語にしては珍しいことである。{/n}

languages.text: “纯净之水中的水晶晶莹剔透。周期偏离的情况有所增加，正如阿玛纳特期望的那样。”{n}亚伯低下头，音阵合成器中传来了你从来没听过的二进制语赞美诗。这首赞美诗充满了活力，精确的节奏非常悦耳，这在{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}机械修会{/g}的语言体系之中极其罕见。{/n}
languages.original_text: "A crystal is exquisite in clear water. Deviation from the Cycle's trajectory has been increased, as was Amarnat's wish." {n}Abel lowers his head, and his vox-synthesiser broadcasts a binharic hymn you do not recall having heard before. Its sound is full of vibrant energy and its precise rhythm is nothing short of pleasing to the ear: a rare thing for the language of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “纯净之水中的水晶晶莹剔透。周期偏离的情况有所增加，正如阿玛纳特期望的那样。”{n}亚伯低下头，音阵合成器中传来了你从来没听过的二进制语赞美诗。这首赞美诗充满了活力，精确的节奏非常悦耳，这在{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}机械修会{/g}的语言体系之中极其罕见。{/n}

languages.text: "Ein Kristall ist in klarem Wasser erlesen. Die Abweichung von der Kurve des Zyklus wurde erhöht, wie es Amarnats Wunsch war." {n}Abel senkt den Kopf, und aus seinem Vox-Synthesizer erklingt eine binhäre Hymne, von der du glaubst, dass du sie noch nie gehört hat. Sie ist voller Lebensenergie, und ihr präziser Rhythmus schmeichelt den Ohren, was bei der Sprache des {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g} selten vorkommt.{/n}
languages.original_text: "A crystal is exquisite in clear water. Deviation from the Cycle's trajectory has been increased, as was Amarnat's wish." {n}Abel lowers his head, and his vox-synthesiser broadcasts a binharic hymn you do not recall having heard before. Its sound is full of vibrant energy and its precise rhythm is nothing short of pleasing to the ear: a rare thing for the language of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ein Kristall ist in klarem Wasser erlesen. Die Abweichung von der Kurve des Zyklus wurde erhöht, wie es Amarnats Wunsch war." {n}Abel senkt den Kopf, und aus seinem Vox-Synthesizer erklingt eine binäre Hymne, von der du glaubst, dass du sie noch nie gehört hat. Sie ist voller Lebensenergie, und ihr präziser Rhythmus schmeichelt den Ohren, was bei der Sprache des {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Mechanicus{/g} selten vorkommt.{/n}

languages.text: « Exquise vision que celle d'un cristal plongé dans l'eau claire. La déviation de la trajectoire du cycle a augmenté, conformément au souhait d'Amarnat. » {n}Abel baisse la tête et son synthétiseur-vox émet un hymne binhaire que vous ne vous rappelez pas avoir déjà entendu. La musique est empreinte d'une vibrante énergie et son rythme précis est une douce mélodie à votre oreille, chose fort rare pour la langue de l'{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}.{/n}
languages.original_text: "A crystal is exquisite in clear water. Deviation from the Cycle's trajectory has been increased, as was Amarnat's wish." {n}Abel lowers his head, and his vox-synthesiser broadcasts a binharic hymn you do not recall having heard before. Its sound is full of vibrant energy and its precise rhythm is nothing short of pleasing to the ear: a rare thing for the language of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Exquise vision que celle d'un cristal plongé dans l'eau claire. La déviation de la trajectoire du cycle a augmenté, conformément au souhait d'Amarnat. » {n}Abel baisse la tête et son synthétiseur-vox émet un hymne binhaire que vous ne vous rappelez pas avoir jamais entendu. La musique est empreinte d'une vibrante énergie et son rythme précis est une douce mélodie à votre oreille, chose fort rare pour la langue du {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Mechanicus{/g}.{/n}

languages.text: «Un cristal es exquisito en aguas límpidas. Se ha incrementado la desviación de la trayectoria del Ciclo, tal y como deseaba Amarnat». {n}Abel baja la cabeza, y su voco sintetizador emite un himno binario que no recuerdas haber oído antes. Su sonido es enérgico, y su cadencia matemática resulta placentera al oído: algo insólito tratándose de la lengua del {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}.{/n}
languages.original_text: "A crystal is exquisite in clear water. Deviation from the Cycle's trajectory has been increased, as was Amarnat's wish." {n}Abel lowers his head, and his vox-synthesiser broadcasts a binharic hymn you do not recall having heard before. Its sound is full of vibrant energy and its precise rhythm is nothing short of pleasing to the ear: a rare thing for the language of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Un cristal es exquisito en aguas límpidas. Se ha incrementado la desviación de la trayectoria del Ciclo, tal y como deseaba Amarnat». {n}Abel baja la cabeza, y su vocosintetizador emite un himno binario que no recuerdas haber oído antes. Su sonido es enérgico, y su cadencia matemática resulta placentera al oído: algo insólito tratándose de la lengua del {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Mechanicus{/g}.{/n}

languages.text: "Berrak suda zarafetini sergileyen bir kristal. Amarnat'ın dilediği gibi Döngü'nün istikametinden sapma oranı arttı." {n}Abel, başını eğip voks sentezleyicisinden sana aşina gelmeyen, ikilidil bir dua okumaya başlıyor. Sesine canlı bir enerji hâkim, net ritimleri de kulağa tartışma götürmez bir şekilde hoş geliyor. Bu durum, {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus'un{/g} dilinde pek nadir görülür.{/n}
languages.original_text: "A crystal is exquisite in clear water. Deviation from the Cycle's trajectory has been increased, as was Amarnat's wish." {n}Abel lowers his head, and his vox-synthesiser broadcasts a binharic hymn you do not recall having heard before. Its sound is full of vibrant energy and its precise rhythm is nothing short of pleasing to the ear: a rare thing for the language of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Berrak suda zarafetini sergileyen bir kristal. Döngü'nün, istikametinden ayrılış oranı arttı. Amarnat'ın dilediği gibi." {n}Abel başını eğiyor ve voks sentezleyicisinden sana aşina gelmeyen ikilidil bir dua okumaya başlıyor. Sesi canlı bir enerjiyle dolu ve net ritmleri kulağa tartışma götürmez bir şekilde hoş geliyor: {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g} dili için nadir bir durum.{/n}
